name: Connect2Go
0:
”Alexa, Arm my Security System in away mode”
”Alexa, is the front door open?”
”Alexa, disarm home”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows users with a Connect2Go enabled security system to access their system with their voice. Your Connect2Go dealer will inform you if you have the proper equipment installed 

Users can ask the state of any zone on the security system in real-time, along with the state of the panel itself. Users can also opt-into control of the system allowing you to arm and disarm the system via your Alexa device.

You can arm your system in STAY and AWAY modes along with disarming the security system using your existing user code. You can also query the security system as to the state of each door and window zone installed in your home or business.
